about_the_game:
Uncover the Mysteries of a Forgotten Past


Awaken to a world shrouded in mystery in this captivating JRPG dungeon crawler. Follow the intertwined fates of Feriza, Layla, and Yosephine as they navigate treacherous dungeons and face formidable foes, all while piecing together the fragments of their lost memories.

A Journey into the Unknown


Three strangers. One shared destination. No memories.

Feriza awakens in a dark, unfamiliar cave with only a single thought echoing in her mind: she must reach the Dawnseeker Ruins. Soon, she encounters Layla and Yosephine, two other young women who share the same mysterious compulsion. Together, they embark on a perilous quest through uncharted lands, facing danger at every turn.

What awaits them in the enigmatic Dawnseeker Ruins? Will they uncover the truth about their past, or stumble upon an even greater mystery?

Key Features

  • - Strategic Turn-Based Combat: Master the art of tactical warfare as you face off against a diverse array of foes.
  • - Innovative Charge Battle System: Experience a fresh twist on classic JRPG combat with our unique Charge system. Time your attacks, build up power, and unleash devastating combos!
  • - Dungeon Delving: Explore a variety of intricately designed dungeons, each with its own theme, puzzles, and secrets to uncover.
  • - Character-Driven Narrative: Immerse yourself in a rich, emotional story as Feriza, Layla, and Yosephine struggle to reclaim their identities and unravel the truth behind their shared destiny.
  • - Stunning Visuals: Lose yourself in beautifully crafted environments and character designs that bring this mysterious world to life.

Embark on an unforgettable adventure in "Ruins of Dawnseeker" – where every step forward is a step closer to the truth, and every memory recovered could change everything.

Are you ready to seek the dawn?

name: Ruins of Dawnseeker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 / Windows 8.1
  • Processor: AMD A4 4000 APU or Intel Celeron B840
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5450 / Intel HD 2500 / Nvidia GT 420
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 Bit 44.1 Khz
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD A4 9125 APU or Intel Celeron N4100
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6450 / Intel HD 3000 / Nvidia GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 Bit 44.1 Khz
